title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 November 2013 - XWiki
content:

09:33 <DarkKnightCZ> hi, anyone here using excel export macro? i have installed jxl, excel plugin and livetable excel export macro, but when i click on export, all i get is json values for export... any ideas?  
09:39 <DarkKnightCZ> hmm "cannot register UI component" bug  
09:42 <sburjan> DarkKnightCZ: I have the same problem  
09:42 <sburjan> could you create a JIRA issue about this ?  
09:44 <vmassol> evalica: good morning, maybe this is something you coudl fix for VFD: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9735 ?  
09:44 <evalica> vmassol: I'll take a look - thanks  
09:45 <DarkKnightCZ> sburjan: sure, if i figure out steps how to reproduce it :)  
09:45 <sburjan> DarkKnightCZ: well it seems following the setup steps from the documentation is enough  
09:51 <DarkKnightCZ> sburjan: what version of xwiki do you use?  
09:51 <sburjan> I tried on 5.2 I think  
10:01 <sburjan> vmassol: any idea when GL will be online ?  
10:08 <DarkKnightCZ> sburjan: XWIKI-9741  
10:09 <sburjan> DarkKnightCZ: Thanks  
10:10 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <DarkKnightCZ> np  
10:39 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <vmassol> sburjan: he is now online :)  
10:45 <gdelhumeau> hi  
10:45 <gdelhumeau> me?  
10:56 <DarkKnightCZ1> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
10:57 <DarkKnightCZ1> is now known as <DarkKnightCZ>  
11:03 <tmortagne> lucaa: is this a mistake ?  
11:03 <lucaa> tmortagne: yes, of course it is. on github, clicked too fast  
11:03 <lucaa> do you know if I can delete it on github?  
11:04 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
11:05 <tmortagne> lucaa: never found how but did not check in the lest version of the UI  
11:05 <tmortagne> s/lest/last/  
11:05 <lucaa> tmortagne: I found the syntax for pushing it from my local, will do that  
11:05 <lucaa> sorry for the noise  
11:06 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
11:11 <thotavrao> has quit  
11:20 <vmassol> lucaa: trying to beef up your commit rate for the year?  
11:20 <vmassol> :)  
11:20 <vmassol> (you're now no longer a inactive committer)  
11:21 <vmassol> nice trick!  
11:24 <vrachieru> has quit  
11:24 <vrachieru> has joined #xwiki  
11:44 <lucaa> vmassol: omg you caught me!  
11:45 <lucaa> it's just that with git it's sooo easy  
11:45 <lucaa> ...to messup things  
11:45 <vmassol> it's less easy than with cvs or svn  
11:45 <vmassol> since you need to push to have an effect  
11:45 <vmassol> so you've got a bugger  
11:46 <vmassol> buffer  
11:46 <vmassol> ;)  
11:46 <vmassol> (a local buffer where you can mess up  
11:46 <vmassol> )  
11:52 <lucaa> yes, well, indeed, git\_hub\_'s mess this time, not my local git  
11:54 <andrewmcveigh|wo> has quit  
12:21 <camil7> has joined #xwiki  
13:02 <thotavrao> has joined #xwiki  
13:34 <DarkKnightCZ> if i have class, where instances of that class have edit and delete actions, is it possible to create another, custom action? or what is the best practice, if i need to create "scripted  custom view"?  
13:43 <DarkKnightCZ> ok, got it via $request  
13:48 <vmassol> tmortagne: there's a bug in XAR export in my build  
13:48 <vmassol> (I built yesterday)  
13:48 <tmortagne> vmassol: which is ?  
13:48 <vmassol> it contains tons of package.xml files  
13:48 <vmassol> when I export a single page  
13:48 <vmassol> using the menu  
13:49 <vmassol> and there are lots of exceptions in the console  
13:49 <tmortagne> I don't understand, it contains several entries with the same path ?  
13:49 <vmassol> just try to reproduce it it's easy  
13:51 <vmassol> hmm problem is that even if I turn the new wikistream of it still fails  
13:51 <vmassol> xwiki.action.import.xar.usewikistream=0  
13:52 <vmassol> I need to export some pages…. hmmm that's starting to be a pain, I guess I need to download some older version and configure it to use my db  
13:52 <tmortagne> xwiki.action.import.xar.usewikistream is for import as you can see in the name  
13:52 <vmassol> ah  
13:52 <vmassol> ah indeed you added some config  
13:52 <vmassol> :)  
13:52 <tmortagne> and it's disabled by default as indicated in the comment  
13:52 <vmassol> it used to be hte last one  
13:53 <vmassol> ok cool works  
13:53 <vmassol> (with hte old export)  
13:59 <DarkKnightCZ> how can i easily iterate through all document revisions? the easiest way i can see right now is getting or.suigeneris.jrcs.rcs.Version array from getRevisions() method, then somehow concat array it returns from method getNumbers() to get revision number and then calling doc.getDocumentRevision(), but it seems to stupid to be the only way  
14:01 <vmassol> DarkKnightCZ: you could check the code for the history tab at the bottom  
14:01 <vmassol> $document.getRevisions()  
14:01 <vmassol> will give you all the versions  
14:01 <vmassol> returns an array of Version[]  
14:02 <DarkKnightCZ> yes, but Version is 3rd party code that doesnt have any method, that returns string (only tostring with stringbuffer param)  
14:02 <DarkKnightCZ> where can i see History tab code?  
14:03 <vmassol> there's a tostring  
14:03 <vmassol> I think  
14:03 <DarkKnightCZ> yep, just tried it, thanks  
14:05 <vmassol> DarkKnightCZ: here:  
14:05 <vmassol> $stringtool.join($doc.revisions, ',')  
14:05 <tmortagne> vmassol: fixed, I'm surprised no integration test failed, there is at least one that does XAR export  
14:05 <DarkKnightCZ> vmassol: yep, thanks  
14:18 <vmassol> going to reimport the core language properties on l10n  
14:33 <mflorea> has quit  
14:35 <gdelhumeau> do we have a special mailing list for l10n?  
14:37 <vmassol> no  
14:37 <lucaa> has quit  
14:38 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:46 <j-simard> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <vmassol> platform just failed  
14:49 <vmassol> internal reason:  
14:49 <vmassol> Caused by: org.sonatype.aether.transfer.ArtifactNotFoundException: Could not find artifact org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-platform-store:pom:5.3-SNAPSHOT in local.central (file:///home/hudson  
14:49 <vmassol> agent/hudson\_root/workspace/xwiki-platform/.repository)  
14:49 <vmassol> when building the packager plugin ITs  
14:50 <tmortagne> packager plugin fail pretty often  
14:50 <vmassol> tmortagne: maybe we're missing deps  
14:50 <vmassol> and since we have isolated local repos now  
14:50 <vmassol> they're not drawn  
14:51 <vmassol> well it's one repo per job  
14:51 <vmassol> so in this case it's the platform lcoal repo  
14:51 <vmassol> should be in there  
14:51 <vmassol> checking  
14:51 <vmassol> please don't restart it on a2  
14:52 <tmortagne> vmassol: if it's built before and if it's even build (it usually fail when platform is partially built after a commit)  
14:52 <tmortagne> s/build/built/  
14:53 <vmassol> indeed there only version 5.2.1 of platform-store in there  
14:53 <tmortagne> it's currently running on a2 already  
14:53 <vmassol> so not 5.3-SNAPSHOT  
14:53 <vmassol> which means we must be missing some dep  
14:53 <vmassol> now that's strange that it's never been built on a2  
14:57 <vmassol> so store-api has not been built by this job  
14:57 <vmassol> probably a partial rebuild  
14:57 <vmassol> the question is why it's not there already  
14:57 <vmassol> maybe the cleaner is too aggressive  
14:57 <vmassol> checking that  
14:59 <gdelhumeau> guys, should we fix XWIKI-9737 for rc1?  
15:06 <cjd> has quit  
15:07 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: when using the old workspaces there was no Admin user right?  
15:07 <vmassol> so it's a regression  
15:20 <gdelhumeau> ok, I have made a proposal on the issue  
15:25 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: why would we need it for the main wiki?  
15:26 <vmassol> strike that  
15:26 <gdelhumeau> if not, by default, you have no admin  
15:26 <vmassol> there's superadmin but it's a bigger change  
15:26 <vmassol> not for now  
15:26 <vmassol> ok commenting  
15:27 <gdelhumeau> I think it is good to have a default admin in a brand new wiki instance  
15:27 <gdelhumeau> \*xwiki instance  
15:27 <vmassol> there's one  
15:27 <vmassol> it's called superadmin  
15:27 <gdelhumeau> but not superadmin  
15:27 <vmassol> but that's naother dicussion  
15:27 <vmassol> we've had it alrzady on the lsit  
15:27 <gdelhumeau> beacuse you have to enable it in the configuration files  
15:27 <gdelhumeau> and it is not a good pratice to use it  
15:27 <vmassol> please read the list discussion  
15:27 <vmassol> all these are answered :)  
15:28 <gdelhumeau> IMO the superadmin should be used only when there is problem on the wiki  
15:28 <gdelhumeau> ok  
15:34 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: the right way is what I indicated in my comment, generate admin user as DW first step asking for the password

17:12 <vmassol> grrr http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/monitoring?part=graph&graph=usedMemory&period=semaine is still growing....  
17:28 <vmassol> does anyone have a 5.2.1 ready to test something?  
17:29 <msmeria> has quit  
17:37 <camil7> vmassol: yes, me, but just the plain jetty/hsql for testing  
17:38 <vmassol> camil7: http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-9749  
17:38 <vmassol> just tested it on xwiki.org  
17:38 <vmassol> and it's a bug :(  
17:38 <vmassol> a regression brought in 5.2.1 apparentrly  
17:38 <vmassol> even worse  
17:38 <vmassol> mflorea: any idea?  
17:38 <camil7> ah, no subwikis in the test instance ... one moment ...  
17:41 <camil7> hm, neither workspaces now wiki manager in the wiki, even though extension manager says it is installed ...  
17:46 <camil7> ah, me stupid, forgot to install the template wiki ;)  
17:47 <camil7> the XWiki.XWikiServerWorkspacetemplate still has the (no longer exisiting) WikiManager.WebHome as parent, btw  
17:48 <vmassol> camil7: you'll like 5.3 :)  
17:48 <camil7> ah, yes, sorry, should not bother about that but the search thing  
17:51 <vrachieru> has quit  
17:52 <camil7> I got autocompletion results in search, in a freshly created subwiki and a plain vanilla 5.2.1  
17:53 <camil7> unlike e.g. extensions.xwiki.org, the ajax calls are properly triggered  
17:55 <camil7> of course I get no javascript errors in either case, that would be far too easy :-/  
17:58 <vmassol> hmm  
18:08 <camil7> there is no XWiki.SuggestSolrService on extensions.xwiki.org , maybe that has been renamed, but not migrated ?  
18:08 <vmassol> ah  
18:08 <vmassol> stupid me  
18:08 <vmassol> we have not installed the search app on subwikis of xwiki.org  
18:09 <vmassol> because we wanted the search box to redirect to the main wiki  
18:10 <camil7> that maybe does not make sense for the "hosted wiki" scenario, where local users in subwikis do not even see the main wiki?  
18:11 <camil7> ah, no, now I get it, in that case the url is just wrong, as it always looks for a "local" suggestion service  
18:12 <vmassol> wdym by wrong url?  
18:12 <camil7> well, url to the local wiki SearchSuggest, when the is none at all, and it should query the main wiki instead  
18:13 <camil7> (if that is possible at all and not cause cross domain problems)  
18:13 <camil7> uh, and if in doubt, do not get confused by my chattering ;)  
18:13 <vmassol> we do'nt have this feature ATM  
18:14 <vmassol> what we set up on xwiki.org is a hack  
18:14 <vmassol> we have custom Main.Search pages  
18:14 <vmassol> redirect to the main wiki  
18:14 <vmassol> \*redirecting  
18:14 <vmassol> but our solution doesn't work for suggest  
18:20 <mflorea> vmassol: yes, search app si not installed on subwiki (sorry, I was in a meeting)  
18:20 <tmortagne> we have a that local/global/both information in standard in 5.3 so we should probably make the search and search suggest take in into account  
18:21 <vmassol> mflorea: lucaa says there's still a migration problem which could explain what our user got  
18:24 <mflorea> the only migration issue I talked with lucaa is the fact that you could end up with solr as configured engine even if you had lucene before.  
18:24 <vmassol> mflorea: cheeck on skype  
18:24 <lucaa> mflorea: that's about the same one  
18:35 <sburjan> has quit  
18:38 <gdelhumeau> can someone merge https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/pull/53 and https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/228 ?  
18:39 <gdelhumeau> vmassol: we have break a functionnal test  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> panels and wysiwyg  
18:41 <tmortagne> applied  
18:41 <gdelhumeau> thx tmortagne

19:08 <vmassol> we're tring, we're trying :)  
19:09 <sburjan`> I have tested GD's migrator. It's a total blocker  
19:10 <sburjan`> I'll test again tomorrow, and if I still hit issues, I'll tell you  
19:21 <vmassol> sburjan`: :(  
19:22 <sburjan`> and GD won't be available tomorrow :(  
19:22 <vmassol> indeed  
19:22 <vmassol> ouch
